attributes.action: Yes vote in Scotland means no voting in UK general election
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, all eligible Scottish voters will still be able to vote in the 2015 General Election even if they have voted YES to Scottish Independence in 2014.

I strongly believe that a Yes vote for Scottish Independence should immediately prohibit Scottish voters from taking part in any UK elections.

I believe that Scottish voters would have a Scottish agenda when voting in the UK General Election and would do everything possible to influence the vote to promote Scottish interests at the demise of UK interests.
